bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Submersible Single-Phase Transformers: 167 kVA and Smaller; High Voltage 25 000 V and Below; Low Voltage 600 V and Below
Redline
IEEE Standard for Submersible Single-Phase Transformers: 167 kVA and Smaller; High Voltage 25 000 V and Below; Low Voltage 600 V and Below - Redline
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std C57.12.23-2009 (Revision of IEEE Std C57.12.23-2002) - Redline

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard covers certain electrical, dimensional, and mechanical characteristics and takes into consideration certain safety features of single-phase, 60 Hz, liquid-immersed, self-cooled, submersible distribution transformers with separable insulated high-voltage connectors.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
